listing.listing_description: Stretch out in the sunbed at sunset, gazing out over the canopy on to the Pacific at this modern villa in Santa Teresa. Prefer a little more privacy? Retreat to the bedroom, and enjoy the view from the master’s balcony. Or if you’re in the mood to party, play bartender on the terrace. In the morning, visit The Bakery for a French-inspired brunch.Minimalistic-decor allows Costa Rica’s natural beauty to shine through Casa Noa’s airy interior. Palm trees, contemporary furnishings, and a thoughtful collection of abstract art form an environment that is perfect for hosting, yet smaller enclaves provide getaway spots when desired. On Noa’s interior side, you’ll find a private lawn for a picnic lunch and a bocce court.Afternoons at Casa Noas were made for refreshing swims in the pool, barbequing, and naps in the hammock. The alfresco set is always reading to host the group for a meal, or you could keep it casual and take a plate to the outdoor lounge and bar area. The villa comes with 2 covered parking spaces within the gated property, as well as daily housekeeping and a concierge.Along Santa Teresa’s peninsula, you’ll find a string of pristine beaches, all with their own characters to discover. Forbes Magazine has declared the Malpais/Santa Teresa area to have the “Top 10 Most Breathtaking Beaches”. If you feel like dancing, Coco Loco is a favorite nightclub among locals, featuring live music and DJs at its beachfront setting. And, for dinner, Product C is the spot for fresh seafood.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Conveniently placed between two of Antigua’s most beautiful beaches, Darkwood and Ffryes, this sleek and stylish three-bedroom is the seaside villa of your dreams. With incredible ocean views, lavishly adorned interiors, and quick and easy beach access, Tamarind Hills is one of the island’s most prestigious resorts. From Tamarind Hills location along the coast of Jolly Harbour, you’ll be positioned just minutes from the island’s best restaurants, beachfront bars, golf, and nightlife.Rich wood tones, creamy white walls, and bright accent pieces come together in this luxurious three-bedroom to create a relaxing, yet elegant space for you and your guests to unwind and enjoy an incredible beach getaway. With numerous windows and openings to the terrace, fresh breeze and natural sunlight are fully immersed into the villa’s open concept interior. On the terrace, you’ll love the well adorned outdoor living areas, swimming pool, sun loungers, and easy beach access.Tamarind Hill’s kitchen comes fully equipped with state of the art appliances, a coffee machine, dishwasher, and there’s a barbecue on the terrace. There are formal and alfresco dining areas, both with seating for four. Inside, the villa is outfitted with Wi-Fi, cable television, and air conditioning. And, during your stay, you’ll have a parking space, twenty-four-hour security, and housekeeping every other day.After you’ve spent some time on the beach, take a trip into town and visit the Jolly Harbour Marina area for dinner. Sheer Rocks is one of the island’s highest-rated restaurants, located south of Tamarind Hills, just a short walk along the beach. If you’d prefer something more laid-back, Dennis’s Bar has a suckling pig roast every Sunday or stop in on Friday for a beachfront barbecue. If you’d like to explore some of the island’s historical sites, the English Harbour, a half-hour drive from home, is where you’ll find Fort George, Nelson’s Dockyard, and the Lookout party, every Sunday Night, at Shirley Heights.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Gwynt A Mor, the welsh rendition for Wind and Sea, spans almost 2 acres and enjoys spactacular elevated views.A private gated entrance and private driveway lead to this beautifully orchestrated villa built by one of the leading constructions companies in the TCI. The approximately 5,000 square feet of patio surround the house and the multi-level family friendly pool, tennis court with basketball area plus a popular fire pit, provide amenities for an active Caribbean Lifestyle.The stunning panoramic views from this Caribbean style villa, on the highest point of the north shore, could only be improved if airborne. Sweeping views from the North West Point resort to Parrot Cay need to be seen to be believed.Impeccable detail throughout and elegant furnishings with a traditional flair, the main residence enjoys 4 bedrooms, a spacious light and airy living area, an exquisite kitchen and dining area along with a media/games room.8 foot Spanish cedar doors, LED lighting, GE Monogram appliances and Egyptian limestone tiles throughout with travertine tiles in the bathrooms are just some of the special finishing’s which enhance this superb villa.

listing.listing_description: Promotions may be available for your desired dates, please contact a Villa Special for more information.Luxury living meets the unspoiled natural beauty of the sea at Sundog. Set in an exclusive gated community on famed Grace Bay Beach, the brand-new five-bedroom villa is just steps from its namesake slopes overlooking Smith’s Reef. Open interiors offer incredible ocean views from nearly every room in the house, while access to Grace Bay Club amenities ensures an unforgettable stay in Turks and Caicos.Your stay at Sundog starts with an airport transfer and welcome drink, and continues with daily breakfast service, a pre-stocked kitchen and bar and a complimentary shuttle to nearby resorts for dining. Two private terraces offer plenty of space to sunbathe and water sports equipment lets you explore the island’s famously warm, clear waters. Try out local seafood on the barbecue, eat at the floating al-fresco dining palapa and flip on the fire feature over the plunge pool for added drama.A streamlined, contemporary aesthetic lets the ocean views be the focal point of the villa. On the outside, Sundog appears as a simple white box, but fold-away walls on two sides mean you can look right through the structure—and feel the ocean breeze almost anywhere in the house. You’ll want to spend most of your time in the open-plan great room, where cool neutral tones and modern furnishings create a chic yet casual vibe and a fully equipped kitchen invites quick sit-downs at the breakfast bar.There are three bedrooms in the main house at Sundog and two pool suites; all five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms. In the main house, each of the three bedrooms has a king bed and ocean views. One of the pool suites has a king bed and the other has two twin beds; both have al-fresco showers.From the villa’s location on Grace Bay Beach, it’s a 10-minute walk to Turtle Cove Marina, 2 miles to the Turks and Caicos Islands Tennis Club, 4 miles to Princess Alexandra National Park and 5 miles to downtown Providenciales. Book a tee time at Provo Golf Club, 6 miles away, or explore Long Bay Beach, 6.5 miles away, and Cheshire Hall, 7 miles away. At the end of your stay, make the 4-mile drive to Providenciales International Airport.Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Live out your childhood dreams—while treating yourself to some grown-up luxury—at Tree House. As its name suggests, this Riviera Nayarit vacation rental sits amid the lush canopy just outside Sayulita, perched high enough to have views of the ocean. Its three bedrooms can accommodate eight friends or a small family, or you can reserve them for a honeymoon-like escape with just one special someone.Look out over the forest to the water from furnished outdoor living areas with a hot tub, shower and a dining table for four. If you’d like to explore beyond the villa, a golf cart and two paddleboards are provided. And after a day of exploring, a streaming TV, surround-sound system and Wi-Fi will help you relax.From its palapa-style roof to the massive tree trunks running through its center, Tree House truly feels like part of its surroundings. Two walls of windows frame the central open-concept great room, and if you’d like, you can slide the walls back to open the living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen to the breeze.The villa has two bedrooms with king beds, private en-suite bathrooms and honeymoon-suite-worthy al-fresco showers. Both king bedrooms open to balconies, and one has partial ocean views. The third bedroom has two twin bunk beds, its own balcony and access to a hall bathroom.Guests of Tree House are welcome to take advantage of the shared amenities at the Punta Sayulita Beach Club, just a 2-minute drive from the villa. It’s also a short drive to quiet but beautiful Playa de Los Muertos, plus shopping and dining in laid-back Sayulita Village. If you’d like a little more excitement on your holiday, plan to tee off at nearby Pacifico Litibú Golf Course or spend a night out in Puerto Vallarta.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, contact us.

listing.listing_description: Ease into the rhythm of the tides at the beautiful ocean-view Belharra. Set in the hills of Gouverneur, this gorgeous modern vacation rental looks out over Gustavia, Colombier and miles of blue water stretching to the horizon. Luxury amenities, airy interiors and two suite-style bedrooms will help you—and up to four friends or family—to relax.You’ll have no trouble adapting to the slower pace of life on St. Barts at Belharra. Start the morning with a selection from the villa’s coffee machine, sipped at the sitting area on the deck overlooking the harbor. From there, shift to a lounger in the sun or shade, or take a dip in the infinity pool. Get out your camera to capture the sunset views over Gustavia, then heat up the barbecue and linger around the al-fresco dining area into the evening.Several sets of sliding glass doors connect the villa’s open-plan great room to the deck, so you can enjoy the ocean views from the living area, formal dining area and fully equipped kitchen. The furnishings are contemporary and the vibe is casual and beachy, thanks to warm wood tables and bookshelves, and bright blue accent pillows and vases. A breakfast bar in the kitchen is perfect for a casual meal or a pick-me-up before heading out to the beach.The two bedrooms at Belharra are on the second floor and open to an upper-level, pergola-covered deck with its own lounge furniture and ocean views. Both bedrooms have queen beds and private en-suite bathrooms, as well as vaulted, whitewashed ceilings in classic Caribbean style.Though it became famous as the island where the jet set goes on holiday, St. Barts is wonderful for a stylish beach vacation, romantic escape or honeymoon away from it all. Discover its charms at Flamands Beach, a long stretch of sand only 10 minutes from the villa, or in the upscale boutiques and fine restaurants of downtown Gustavia, equally close by.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Swim in the gentle waters of the Caicos Banks from this beachfront villa on Providenciales. Perched on the southern shore of Turtle Tail, the villa enjoys edge-of-the-world vistas and direct access to some of the most secluded and pristine sands in Turks and Caicos. Explore nearby cays by kayak or paddleboard, or drive minutes to the fairways of Provo Golf Club.The 3,200-square-foot villa is built at a slight elevation above the white-sand beach. An illuminated walkway leads down to the soft sand, where a wooden sundeck is perched beside the lapping surf, and shallow, swimmer-friendly waters extend to the horizon. The ample pool terrace welcomes refreshing dips and long hours under the sun, while a generous veranda provides cool shade for afternoon drinks, barbecue grilling, and alfresco meals.A vanishing wall creates a breezy entry into the cool, spacious interior, where the open-concept layout includes an ample TV lounge, a second dining table, and a chef-grade kitchen with breakfast bar. The design and décor offer a modern take on the classic Caribbean beach cottage, with a stylish minimalism that both emphasizes and enhances the island's profound natural beauty.All 4 of the villa's bedrooms feature king beds and ensuite bathrooms, and all open to a balcony or terrace with ocean views. These accommodations are ideal for multiple couples, families, destination wedding guests, or business retreats.From the secluded haven of Turtle Tail, you're an easy drive to the beach and bustling nightlife scene of Grace Bay, the marina at Turtle Cove, and the famous Thursday Fish Fry at the Bight Park. But you may never want to leave this private paradise: the beach itself is one of the most serene on the island, and the Caicos Banks offer serene waters for wading, swimming, and kayak adventures.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Magnificent Villa Paraiso is within 5 minutes of unspoiled Manuel Antonio Beach amid Costa Rica’s smallest national park. With unequaled wildlife diversity on your doorstep this soaring, grandly proportioned retreat offers the very best facilities including a huge infinity pool overlooking the Pacific.Completed in 2009, this gracious 8,500 square foot residence is elegantly finished with unique pieces from both local and international artisans. Stylish and capacious living areas and a lush indoor atrium make for a dramatic yet light, airy and cooling ambience. For your utmost comfort ample modern conveniences include Wi-Fi, satellite and cable television, DVD player and media room. There’s also a fully equipped gourmet kitchen for budding chefs, but if you prefer the services of an expert, you can always hire our Executive Chef.Outside your superb outdoor grill and entertainment areas are equally lavish and make the most of sweeping views of the majestic Pacific Ocean. This is truly the ideal setting for a party with seating for up to 26 guests and a generous 75 foot infinity edge pool with a secondary splash pool. Luxurious sun loungers provide the perfect place to relax and enjoy quieter time in the sizzling sun. Casa Paraiso is also afforded the luxuries of a full-time staff, including housekeeping and concierge services.Follow one of the mountain-view exterior covered walkways to one of five sumptuous and delightfully equipped en-suite bedrooms. Separated from the main social areas, these restful rooms ensure complete privacy, comfort and style with superior bedding and handpicked furnishings. Each suite has its own private balcony space so you can take time out away from the larger group and enjoy peaceful private views. Three of the guest suites feature a king bed, while the remaining guest suite is furnished with two queen beds. The opulent Master Suite is separated privately on the second floor and features a king bed and aroma-steam room shower. A special ‘Minstrels´ Gallery’ off the Master Suite is the perfect vantage point to appreciate this property’s spacious design.Manuel Antonio National Park is one of the most famous tourist destinations in Costa Rica. It is a 5 minute drive to Quepos Town, to Manuel Antonio Beach and to the golf course. Within 10 minutes you can be at Quepos Airport and it’s a 45 minute drive to Jaco Beach.Please note - due to villa layout and multiple staircases, this property may not be suitable for individuals with mobility issues.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

listing.listing_description: This exceptional St. Barts villa is perched above the white sands of Flamands Beach, along the north coast of the island, with breathtaking views encompassing the bay, the islands of Saint Martin and Anguilla, and the vast Caribbean Sea. The beautifully designed home features spacious living and dining areas both indoors and alfresco, including an ample terrace with infinity pool. Dual master suites with ocean views make it the perfect choice for two couples or a small family, or even honeymooners seeking extra space and privacy. Flamands Beach is within easy walking distance, and Gustavia Airport just three kilometers away.The villa's exquisite design fuses the terrace and interiors into a single, graceful space, ideal for festive gatherings or serene relaxation with loved-ones. The décor evokes the sophisticated simplicity and elegant naturalism of St. Barthelemy, with vaulted, white-washed ceilings, blue-green walls, and beautiful lanterns illuminating your nighttime revels. Delicious ocean air and sublime views pervade the home, providing pure inspiration at every hour.Savor a dip in the voluminous swimming pool, and recline on lounge chairs under the exquisite island sun. Prepare meals in the superbly appointed gourmet kitchen or at the outdoor barbeque, and relish them at the central dining table amid the gentle, sea-kissed breeze. Relax in the comfortable salon with classic Caribbean beverages, watching your favorite shows or cuddling up to admire the sublime vista of sea and sky.The bedroom suites offer tranquil and spacious havens for downtime and rest, perfectly designed to breathe the sea-kissed air. Each room features a king bed, private terrace with ocean view, Apple TV, safe, air conditioning, and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity and shower. One of the rooms has a large walk-in closet, as well.Flamands Beach is about five hundred meters from the villa, and you're within three to five kilometers of some of other enchanting shores, including St Jean and Nikki Beach. The dining and nightlife of Gustavia are fifteen kilometers away. Proximity to the airport makes Flamands Bay a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Imagine swimming among jungle treetops and floating in the serenity of a blue-green water infinity pool. Nestled high enough for Pacific Ocean views this private villa and cottage is set in the hillside within walking distance of Playa Guiones and Nosara Beach, renown for great surfing. The heart of Villa Corazon del Arbol is its enormous terrace with tall rough-hewn tree columns supporting a massive wood-paneled overhang. Surrounded by the privacy and sounds of the jungle, most rooms face the terrace. Large sliding glass doors open up the gourmet kitchen, living room, dining areas, and even the master bedroom terrace doors open directly into the infinity pool for an early morning or late evening quiet swim. Entertaining, barbecues, lounging, and parties all happen as people drift in and out to the terrace area. Beamed ceilings, wood tables and neutral tropical décor punctuated with fun bamboo lights create airy casual rooms. Water shoes are a must for navigating rocks along the coastline of Nosara Beach. It seems like everyone in Playa Guiones does yoga. Classes from beginners on up are ongoing in the spas and wellness centers. Howler monkeys, iguanas, and anteaters are just a few of the thousands of critters that make their home at the Nosara Biological Reserve’s 90 acres. It’s open for hiking and sightings on the well-marked trails. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The picturesque approach to Belle Fontaine sets the mood for this elegant French Provence meets Creole style villa. A long stone walled drive, lined with tropical flowers and shrubs, brings you to the entrance filled with architectural beauty. Coral stones embedded with colorful ceramic tiles, Moorish inspired arches and windows trimmed in blue, country style shutters and terracotta roof offer an exotic tropical welcome. From the moment you step inside, the view spans before you. Swaying palms frame the sapphire blue sea, endless sky and the outline of Saba. Colorful tropical gardens surround the house and deck. The mood is very peaceful.Set in expansive epi wood, the new double pool dazzles in blues. The smaller pool is inset with a tiled table, just waiting for your cold beverage. The larger pool is for swimming under the Caribbean sun. Surrounding the pool is crisp blue and white deck furniture that perfectly complements the view. Tall palms and native boulders accent the deck. A large gazebo, set to one side of the terrace, contains generous seating for lounging and dining, plus a built in BBQ. It’s a superb place to relax and watch the colorful sunsets.The cool interiors are designed to take full advantage of the view. Floor to ceiling glass doors, terracotta floors, high vaulted ceilings and arched windows accent the spacious areas for seating and dining. The décor blends modern exotic lines with the softness of Provence. Rattan, teak and bleached woods are adorned with white and blue fabrics. Underfoot, oriental carpets add exotic color; eclectic decorative pieces complement the mood. The large, well equipped kitchen has a French country attitude. Large arched windows bring in the view and connect the kitchen to the terrace.The five equal size bedrooms are spacious and glamourous. Three have sea views from the bedroom; two have garden views. The décor is romantic in tranquil shades of white touched with color. The beautiful spa style bathrooms, detailed with fabulous fixtures, have a modern Moorish touch. Large walk-in showers overlook the sea or garden; one has a private outdoor patio.Although quite secluded you are close to the Terres Basses beaches. You are two minutes to Baie Nettle and seven minutes to the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, the Creole Market, galleries and shopping. It’s a 10 minute drive to the airport and 30 minutes to both Grand Case and Phillipsburg.

listing.listing_description: Follow a secret staircase to a bedroom suite or palapa for two at this colorful retreat perched over the Jalisco coast. The infinity pool, rooftop terraces, and open-sided living area make the most of the Pacific panoramas from this fully staffed villa. Walk down to local institution Playa Rosa Beach Club for ceviche and cocktails with your sunset views, then ride the funicular back up to bed. Stretch out in loungers in the sun and shade on the ocean-view terrace before cooling off in the infinity pool or sitting down to dinner at the al-fresco table for 8. There’s even a hammock and swing to help you slow to the rhythm of a holiday. After sunset, stargaze from the rooftop terraces or turn to the smart TV and Wi-Fi for entertainment. From the palapa roof over the great room and the tree-like beams holding it up to the potted palms growing indoors, this vacation rental brings nature inside for a feeling of organic luxury. Flower-inspired pops of pink, coral, and teal add to the vibe in the open-concept living and dining room, as do polished wood cabinets in the fully equipped kitchen. There are 3 bedrooms in the main house at Constellation Dragon: 2 with king beds, and one with 2 double beds. The fourth bedroom has a king bed and is in a separate suite reached by hidden staircase, making it perfect for a couple reliving their honeymoon. All 4 bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms. The villa is part of the exclusive Costa Careyes resort, designed to be a Mediterranean-inspired hideaway on the Pacific coast of Mexico. Today, this Costalegre retreat is a haven of intriguing art and architecture, great restaurants, and family-friendly beaches—the closest of which is just a short ways downhill from the villa. Make new friends at El Careyes Club or Careyes Polo Club, and be sure to ask about their favorite wonders, as the local art installations are known. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From its scenic perch in Peterborg, this Caribbean luxury villa captures incredible views of the sea and nearby, Magen’s Bay Beach. The stately Pallina features accommodations for eight, spread across four bedrooms, two of which are considered masters, both with king beds, ensuites, and ocean views. The island’s capital, Charlotte Amalie, is where you’ll find most of St. Thomas’ boutique shops, restaurants, and nightlife establishments. However, the furthest reaches of St. Thomas are easily accessible in a short drive, making the entire island yours to discover.Pallina’s elegant interior decor shows off its colonial roots with white-washed walls, rich wood tones, and chandelier lighting. The fully equipped kitchen is decked out with stainless steel appliances, sure to inspire culinary creativity. There’s formal and alfresco dining areas, as well as a barbeque on the terrace for more casual meals. And, thanks to numerous openings to the terrace, Pallina enjoys the fresh sea breeze, natural sunlight, and a social open-air flow throughout its entire estate.On the terrace, you’ll love relaxing in the hot tub, perfecting your tan from a sun lounger, and splashing around in the swimming pool. Back inside, you’ll appreciate Pallina’s, wine fridge, and air conditioning.Feel like exploring? St. Thomas is known for its incredible snorkeling, kayaking, and scuba diving tours that take you around the island’s gorgeous inlets and mangroves. If you’d prefer to stay dry, check out some of the island’s most important historical sites, like Black Beard’s Castle, Tombstone Rock, and Ninety-Nine Steps. . When it’s time to head for the beach, Magen’s Bay, Hull Bay, Coki Point, and Lindbergh beaches are all within ten-kilometers.

listing.listing_description: Find your own Caribbean paradise at Nevaeh. Set on a private, gated lot that stretches down to a half-mile of pristine beach on Anguilla’s Long Bay, this luxury oceanfront vacation rental boasts stunning views and pampering service. Taking its design cues from local architecture and Balinese decor alike, this luxury villa has a breezy modern feel, and nine bedrooms spread between the main house and guest house offer generous accommodations.Your stay at Nevaeh includes full breakfast, chef service for three meals per day, butler service, ground transfers on Anguilla, open bar and your very own four-seater UTV and golf carts for cruising around the villa property and through the local village. Challenge friends or family to a game on the tennis/basketball court or at beach volleyball, or take the kayaks and sea scooters out to explore the bay. Stretch out on a lounge chair on the beach or on the terrace by the infinity pool and hot tub. After a day in the water or the sun, there’s nothing like fresh seafood, grilled on the barbecue and served at the al-fresco dining area. Stay out for some stargazing from the hot tub, set the mood with the Sonos sound system or head inside to the home theater room or high-tech golf simulator. Massages or yoga sessions can be arranged under the ocean terrace gazeboNevaeh is laid out around a charming central courtyard but furnished on a grand scale, making the house feel both stately and inviting. A Japanese-style garden sets a serene tone in the courtyard that’s continued by the Balinese temple doors, carved wooden sofas and chairs and oversized lanterns in the living room and the casual wicker furniture and polished wood cabinets in the adjoining media room. The calm, refined vibe continues in the fully equipped kitchen, which pairs palm motifs and stone countertops with gourmet appliances and a large breakfast bar.There are five bedrooms in the main house at Nevaeh, three in the guest house and a free-standing cabana, so the property can easily accommodate events like a family reunion, milestone birthday celebration or small wedding (and even the honeymoon after). In the main house, each bedroom has a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and one of the suites has an outdoor heated plunge pool. The guest house has one master bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom and two bedrooms with two queen beds each, that share a bathroom. There is also a second kitchen and living area in the guest house.If you’re dreaming of a Caribbean beach vacation, you’re in luck: a holiday at Nevaeh puts you right on Long Bay Beach, one of the most private and beautiful beaches on Anguilla. Practice on the home’s golf simulator before heading out to the real thing at Cuisinart Resort Golf Course, 3.2 km away, and find several gourmet dining spots a short golf cart ride away on Meads Bay Beach, one of the most popular spots on the island. At the end of your trip, catch a boat from Blowing Point Ferry Terminal, 6.5 km away, or a flight from Clayton J. Lloyd International Airport, 10 km away.

listing.listing_description: This newly built two-level home is one of our must-visit St. Barts villas thanks to its excellent sea views and spacious, private terrace. Nestled in the Caribbean Sea, the island of St. Barts is known for luxury and its white sand beaches that attract the rich and famous from around the world, and you’ll get to experience all of that during your stay.Take in panoramic views of the bay of Petit Cul de Sac, and the sea beyond, from the privacy of the villa’s large deck. Choose from one of the lounge chaises to sip on a cool drink and soak in the island’s sun. The villa also features an outdoor pool—the best way to cool off on a warm day. In the evenings, fire up the barbecue for an alfresco meal on the dining table with seating for six under the covered terrace.Inside, the decor is minimalist and modern with soft neutral tones, white furnishings and wooden accents. The spacious living room features a plush sofa as well as a flatscreen television, and opens up to the terrace. The nearby kitchen is fully equipped with all the appliances you need to put together a home-cooked meal.La Magnifica features two bedrooms on different floors that can comfortably sleep up to four guests. The master bedroom features a king-sized bed, air conditioning, private en-suite bathroom, flatscreen television and views of the sea as well as access to the terrace. The second bedroom offers similar perks: a king-sized bed, air conditioning, en-suite bathroom and flatscreen television.Take advantage of the nearby beaches of Grand Cul de Sac and Petit Cul de Sac, both offer excellent swimming opportunities as well as sunbathing spots on white sand. A 7.3 km drive brings you to the bustling capital, Gustavia, home to the best boutique shopping, restaurants and spas the island has to offer.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Soak in the sun at this premiere ultra-modern luxury oceanfront villa located on the island of Providenciales. This private vacation rental sits right at the edge of the clear turquoise waters of Chalk Sound National Marine Park. You will be able to read, swim, tan – or hide from the sun, listen to music and eat outdoors while viewing the ever-changing colors of the renowned clear waters of Turks and Caicos. If you are a more active traveler, feel free to take out the villa’s kayaks while exploring the natural beauty of Chalk Sound.Step onto the private coral stone patio, an ideal spot for enjoying barbeques and dining alfresco. You can laze around in the many loungers while enjoying a good book, tan or simply take an afternoon nap while the trade wind breezes cool you down. Take a dip any time of day in the infinity swimming pool that sinks into the patio below, overlooking the majestic waters of Chalk Sound. Your reservation includes mid-week housekeeping.The spacious open concept area includes a living room with modern leather sofas and a 65” flat screen television with cable television, Apple TV and Wii. The open, modern and fully furnished kitchen features stainless steel appliances, a wine refrigerator and granite countertops. The large formal dining table seats ten. Wi-Fi is also available throughout the property. We recommend Villa Capri for a family holiday, a corporate retreat or a special celebration such as a wedding, birthday or anniversary.Four exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. Each bedroom provides a king size bed, an en-suite bathroom and a flat screen television. The master suite includes a dual vanity, a large soaking tub and a stand-up rain shower. The villa also has an additional powder room for your convenience. Complimentary luxury toiletries are included.Feeling adventurous? Take a plunge from the deck into the waters below and go for a swim or snorkeling quest. Or take the two minute drive to Sapodilla Bay Beach, Taylor Bay Beach and Las Brisas Restaurant. Golf aficionado? Book a tee off time at nearby Provo Golf Club. Step into a tranquil tropical haven far away from the hustle and bustle of the daily grind – have your vacation, your way!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Easy elegance and timeless ocean views make Casa Luca a warm-weather getaway par excellence. Set in the exclusive Pedregal neighborhood above downtown Cabo San Lucas, this beautiful Los Cabos vacation rental is a short walk from a private beach and commands sweeping vistas over the Pacific. Its five bedrooms make it the perfect size to relax or entertain with up to ten friends or family members.Your stay at this luxury property includes the services of a housekeeper and on-site concierge, who can help arrange activities or give tips on spotting whales from the villa. The expansive outdoor living areas feature a heated infinity pool, hot tub, gas barbecue, lounging and dining areas in the sun and shade, and even a fruit orchard. Inside, you’ll find an exercise room, sauna, satellite Television, sound system and Wi-Fi.The villa’s colonial-inspired interiors are a mix of traditional refinement and modern charm. Fold-away walls lead to airy, open living and dining rooms with classic beamed ceilings and graceful furnishings. Preparing everything from snacks to feasts is a breeze thanks to the butler’s pantry, prep kitchen and fully equipped kitchen.Casa Luca has two bedrooms with king beds, two bedrooms with queen beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ocean views, and several open to a terrace or the pool area. For larger parties, there is also a queen sofa bed in the study.Spend your holiday relaxing at the villa or exploring the lively Los Cabos area. There are tennis courts in the Pedregal community, and there are plenty of opportunities to fish, golf, snorkel, sail, drive ATVs and more that the concierge can help you take advantage of. After a day of adventure, take a short walk downhill for a honeymoon-worthy stroll on a private beach while watching the sun set over the Pacific, then head into downtown Cabo San Lucas for a night out at one of its restaurants, cantinas and bars.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spectacular views of the ocean await you at this luxury penthouse condo along Paynes Bay. This spacious, four-bedroom retreat, located near one of the island’s best beaches, is one of our top villas in Barbardos. Known as “Little England,” the island of Barbados combines British charm and Caribbean flair and is a popular gateway for visitors looking for sun, tranquil waters and vibrant nightlife.During the day, spread out on one of the Italian loungers on the terrace overlooking the water, with a cool drink in hand, it’s the perfect spot to relax. There’s a private plunge pool on the balcony, while the complex’s shared pool offers a chance for more swimming and socializing. This outdoor space also includes an alfresco dining area for meals in the fresh air.Sitting at over 6,000 square feet, you and your guests will have plenty of space to unwind in this upscale condo. Central air conditioning and marble floors throughout help keep the place cool, while another option is to open the living room’s doors that lead out to the terrace. The living area features stylish and comfortable furniture by designer Lynne Pemberton, while the gourmet kitchen comes well stocked with appliances large and small. Daily housekeeping is included as an added perk.The villa’s four bedrooms can easily sleep up to eight guests, and children are welcome here. Each suite includes an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning and its own television. Three bedrooms feature king beds, while the remaining suite’s two twin beds are perfect for children.Smuggler’s Cove is only one minute away from Paynes Bay Beach. This popular shoreline is known for its beach bar and calm waters that are perfect for swimming or trying out a new water sport like jetskiing and catarmaran sailing. The world famous Sandy Lane Hotel is also nearby, and Holetown’s restaurants and shops are only 10 minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Promotions may be available for your desired dates, please contact a Villa Specialist for more information.Overlooking the sparkling turquoise waters of the sea, little could compare to the sublime vibrations to be experienced at this bijou villa. This luxury residence is part of the illustrious Grace Bay Resorts, one of the first developers to discover this jewel destination on Turks and Caicos. Discerning travelers agree: after your stay at Graceful Living, the Caribbean will simply never be the same!Graceful Living exemplifies luxury living in the Caribbean, with personal concierge service and micro resort amenities including a library and complete exercise room. The immaculately landscaped outdoor space was thoughtfully designed with true luxury in mind, from the infinity swimming pool, outdoor hot tub and palapa, to the decadent outdoor showers. You will also find a spacious deck with alfresco dining. Housekeeping is included and a babysitter, activities, spa services and a chef can be arranged for a nominal fee.The interiors feature high vaulted ceilings that offer that quintessential Caribbean atmosphere. Furnishings are modern and plush. The open plan dining, kitchen and living area offers an easy and breezy feeling. With an established reputation for superlative service and innovation, enjoy the many amenities of Grace Bay: swimming pool, welcome drinks, pool and beach set up alongside complimentary daily American breakfasts, start-up bar and shuttle service.The five fabulous bedrooms at Graceful Living accommodate up to ten guests. Sea views reign supreme in each villa’s two oceanfront master bedrooms with terraces, while the fifth bedroom is located within a private, detached cottage. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms and televisions. Only the finest linens, bedding and accoutrements have been provided to help ensure soothing nights of rest. Wake up each new morning to the shining sun and glimmering sea!In 2015, Grace Bay was awarded TripAdvisor’s coveted ‘Traveler’s Choice’ award for the top quality of its soft sands and clear waters. Nearby outdoor activities include kite surfing, snorkeling and scuba diving. Or try a scooter tour for a change of pace, possibly the best way to see a sunny island that’s only a few miles across. Nature lovers should be sure to check out Little Water Cay, a natural habitat full of friendly iguanas. You will also find the Provo Golf Club nearby, a top ranked eighteen-hole course. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: What was once the finest lookout in Jamaica can be the view from your veranda at Fortlands Point on Discovery Bay. Though it’s named for the military installation that once sat nearby, this luxury vacation rental now only has strategic value when it comes to planning a beachfront Caribbean holiday with a group of family or friends.Whether you want to watch boats ply the bay, dip your feet in the water or get out to kayak or snorkel, the choice is yours on the villa’s three private beaches. On land, the property’s amenities range from a pool, al-fresco sitting and dining areas to an indoor fitness center, television and Wi-Fi. Your stay at Fortlands Point also includes the services of a cook, butlers and housekeeper.Stone walls and wide verandas give the villa a charming ambience that nods to the history of its location. Polished wood floors and palm-print area rugs are traditional touches that lend a sense of tropical elegance. More modern features such as fold-away glass doors let you open the spacious living and dining areas to the breezes off the bay, and high ceilings add to the airy feel.Fortlands Point has five bedrooms with king beds, including one that is wheelchair accessible, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each, including a children’s loft. All seven bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.From the villa’s beachfront location on Discovery Bay, it’s a 13-minute drive to the nearest golf course and 60 minutes to the airport. If you can’t get enough beach time, there are several other sandy stretches in the area where you can relive your honeymoon with a stroll or go for a swim. If you’d like to learn more about the area’s history, visit the open-air museum at Columbus Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.Welcome to Cayman Villa, a luxurious vacation home situated high on Sea Breeze Hills in Cap Estate. Cap Estate is a residential area with private homes and an 18 hole championship golf course, three hotels and restaurants and two beaches. Cayman Villa overlooks the Atlantic Ocean and is perfectly situated to enjoy the mind-blowing views of Martinique (on a clear day) and the lovely Atlantic breeze.Just off the central living room is a media room with a 52 inch plasma television, DVD player and sound system. The sitting room opens out through glass doors onto a walkway with steps leading down to the large patio and pool area. Cayman Villa rests in beautifully landscaped gardens and has its own swimming pool. There’s also a media room and home theater system for entertainment at any time during your vacation in St. Lucia.The entrance to the house leads into an open area which follows through to a well-equipped kitchen, dining room with a dining table for eight and a living room. The open space is made complete with a bar, stocked with a beer and wine cooler, ice maker and an array of glassware. A cook service is included, so you need not spend much time preparing meals.The main house comprises three well established bedrooms with a fully self-contained cottage, adjacent to the house, which acts as the fourth bedroom. The spacious master bedroom suite has a four poster king size bed, flat screen television and en-suite bathroom with a shower and a bath. There are two more bedrooms – bedroom two has a king size bed and en-suite shower room and bedroom three has a king size four poster bed as well as en-suite facilities. The cozy cottage has a king size bed and an en-suite bath and shower room. The cottage is ideal as guest/in-laws quarters. It is located to the left of the main house and is separated by a foot path which allows for privacy if needed. The cottage has an open plan living and kitchen area, complete with microwave, electric cooker and fridge. It also has a charming patio area which looks out to the Atlantic Ocean.When you decide to leave the villa to discover more of the local area, you’ll find the nearby town with restaurant, shopping and a grocery store caters for your needs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find ocean views, a pristine stretch of beach and ample room to relax at the perfectly named Sweet Spot. Set on the golden sands of Runaway Bay, this fully staffed Jamaica vacation rental is a wonderful setting for a beach holiday with the whole family or a Caribbean getaway with friends.Spend your days savoring the warm breezes and panoramic views from beachfront living areas with a pool, wet bar, charcoal barbecue, hammock and a shaded veranda. Take the snorkeling equipment and kayaks out into the ocean, or challenge other guests on the al-fresco ping-pong table and volleyball court. Other amenities include an air-conditioned exercise room, Wi-Fi that extends to the pool area and cable television. Your stay also includes the services of a cook, butler and housekeeper.Traditional architecture and vibrant colors give this 6,000-square-foot luxury property a bold yet inviting appeal. A series of arched doorways leads from the veranda to the living and dining rooms, where hues of orange and blue and beach-inspired artwork lend a lively feel. Multiple sitting areas in the main living room, as well as a separate family room with a television, ensure that there’s room for everyone to socialize or stretch out and read.Sweet Spot has five bedrooms with king beds, four of which have ocean views and balcony access, and one bedroom with two double beds. All six bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and a refined look thanks to carefully selected classic furnishings.While it’s easy to fill a stay with swims in the ocean and honeymoon-style strolls on the beach in front of the villa, there’s plenty more to see in the area. Sweet Spot is just a 3-minute drive from the nearest seafood restaurant, a 10-minute drive from an equestrian center and 15 minutes by car from Cranbrook Flower Park. Make the 20-minute drive to either the tranquil ambience of the spa or the bustling eateries and activity centers in Ocho Rios.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Pelicanos is situated in an ideal location for seekers of sun, fun and adventure. Hillside above Punta Mita’s Four Seasons Resort, this luxury villa offers sweeping vistas of the Four Seasons community, as well as wonderful views of the Pacific Ocean, the Marietas Islands and the entrance to the Bay of Banderas. A modern hacienda in one of the most coveted vacation spots in the world—welcome to Villa Pelicanos!Whether you are having a splash in the wonderful infinity swimming pool or taking a well-deserved soak in the outdoor hot tub, you will enjoy uninterrupted views of the beautiful azure sea. A gas grill sets the tone for some lovely alfresco dining. Located in a gated enclave, Villa Pelicanos offers security, privacy and five-star service. At Villa Pelicanos, you will find a ceiling fan, cable Television, Wi-Fi access and washer & dryer. Your reservation includes housekeeping.Villa Pelicanos is a true showcase of craftsmanship. This resplendent abode is tastefully furnished and reflects a modern Mexican style. Built around a central courtyard, the villa is perfect for families with small children or for a corporate getaway, especially since the villa offers all the comfort and perks you would expect from a Four Seasons villa. Open and airy throughout, indoor and outdoor spaces meld into one in harmony of vision.Four exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests with a maximum of four children at Villa Pelicanos. All of the bedrooms include en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans, televisions and safes. Access to the temperate climate outside is a breeze!Punta Mita is surrounded on three sides by nine and a half miles of Pacific Ocean beaches and coves including Litibu Bay. Gentle sea breezes and a lovely tropical climate make it the perfect place to escape from it all. Nearby activities include golfing, diving, sport fishing, surfing, sailing, sea kayaking, whale watching, mountain biking, hiking, horseback riding, Jeep tours and rainforest excursions. This bijou villa will have you reminiscing about Punta Mita for many years to come!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located near Soufriere’s Anse Chastanet beach, La Bagatelle is perfect for those who appreciate lovely natural surroundings and refined touches. Lush green gardens surround this beautiful two-storey villa, while colorful bougainvillea, poinsettias, vincas, and thunbergia climb and hang from all parts of the home. The famous Pitons are in plain sight as is the tranquil blue water of the Caribbean.Start each day sipping a coffee in a wicker chair on the upstairs porch, watching fishing boats sail off. As the sun warms, head down to the clay-tiled pool terrace and bask in a cozy chaise longue, then cool off with an invigorating plunge. Sizzle up fresh seafood on the outdoor grill and enjoy it all fresco. A hammock and four-poster day bed are perfect escapes from the mid-afternoon heat. At dusk gather your guests around the outdoor lounge set and observe a stunning St. Lucia sunset.The spacious living room is furnished with soft settees, upholstered with designer fabrics and large cushions. Gentle breezes circulate freely courtesy of louver windows and doors. The same smooth greenheart wood which makes up the upper balcony also lines the interior floors. A fully-equipped kitchen will inspire you to create something special for your guests. Enjoy the fruits of your labor around an elegant dining table.Both of La Bagatelle’s bedrooms are found downstairs. The Master suite has a West Indian King size four-poster bed, antique wood furnishings and a stylish en-suite bathroom with Italian tiled shower. The second bedroom houses two additional four-poster beds: Double and Queen size. It also features antique furniture, plus an en-suite bathroom with double sinks. Ceiling fans cool both rooms.You’re free to use a tennis court located below the house. Anse Chastanet beach is a five minute drive and has diving facilities and a protected marine park for snorkeling. Soufriere is close to St. Lucia’s most spectacular natural features: Pitons, Sulphur Springs, botanical gardens, and hidden waterfalls. Shops and restaurants can be found in town, though serious shoppers may opt for a daytrip to Rodney Bay.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Nestled in luxurious gardens with spectacular views, Eden is a magnificent five-bedroom colonial style villa and cottage that is the embodiment of luxury and subtle refinement. Located in the secure and exclusive Sugar Hill Lifestyle Development, this holiday villa for rent boasts a fabulous interior design and provides spacious luxury accommodation and the best of outdoor living.Eden’s magnificent entrance features a sweeping marble staircase that leads on to an elegant living space equipped with an entertainment center. Three sets of doors open up from the living space onto a large covered terrace with spectacular views of the tropical gardens, salt water pool and the Caribbean Sea. This terrace offers a sizeable seating and dining area that can entertain up to twelve persons. Overlooking the pool is a gazebo, where guests can enjoy refreshing aperitifs and relaxed alfresco dining.All bedrooms are beautifully furnished, and air conditioned each with its own spacious marble en-suite bathroom. A short walk across the pool deck is the self-contained cottage consisting of a large kitchen, en-suite bedroom and a dual-aspect media room with doors that open onto its own garden and outdoor seating area.Guests of Eden enjoy exclusive access to Sugar Hill’s Clubhouse and facilities which offer a modern fully equipped air conditioned exercise room, 2000 square feet communal pool, restaurant, and four flood-lit, all-weather tennis courts. Guests also benefit from membership to the prestigious Royal Pavilion Beach Club, which is a five-minute drive from Sugar Hill. Facilities include complimentary towels, beach chairs and umbrellas together with a snack bar. Water sports are also available.Eden has a core team of well-trained, talented and friendly staff which include a Butler, Cook and a Housekeeper, who are flexible to accommodate your needs, ensuring that your stay is relaxing. Eden also has a dedicated Villa Manager, who can offer advice and help with any other requests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This exquisite beachfront home is located within Sailrock Resort on South Caicos island, one of the finest luxury resorts in Turks and Caicos. Perched at a slight elevation just steps from the water, the villa's 3,590 square-foot estate features twenty-five feet of private frontage, an ample swimming pool, and uninterrupted, panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea. Dual master bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms make it an ideal choice for two couples or a family. Your vacation rental incudes access to Sailrock's world-class amenities, along with daily breakfast at the resort and complimentary housekeeping. Numerous other deluxe services are available.The luminous home harmonizes beautifully with the stunning natural beauty of South Caicos, inspiring a profound connection with the spirit of the sea. Two terraces flank the interior great room, with open walls creating an enchanting cross-breeze. Savor the sunlight on armchairs facing the vast horizon, and dip into the refreshing pool. Step from the deck onto the pristine sand and swim in the timeless Caribbean.The great room features peaked ceilings with beautiful exposed-wood beams sheltering an open-concept living and dining area. The kitchen is superbly appointed for the contemporary gourmet, and easily serves the breakfast bar, interior dining table, and alfresco table on the terrace. The lounge is perfect for relaxing with your favorite TV shows or merely admiring the breathtaking ocean views. Ceiling fans complement the breezes, while air conditioning ensures comfort when needed.There is a master suite on either side of the great room, both opening to the pool terrace and beautiful ocean views. Each features a king bed, desk, air conditioning, TV, and superb ensuite bathroom with open-air rain shower and tub.Sailrock Resort offers a wealth of amenities and activities for guests of all ages, including swimming pools, a fitness center, and a variety of watersports. The superb Na Spa specializes in deluxe treatments including Balinese hot stone massage. Dining options include the Great House Restaurant, featuring a wrap-around deck with 360-degree views of the Atlantic Ocean and Caicos Banks. Beyond the resort, you're about four kilometers from the island's famous Salt Salinas. Proximity to the airport makes the villa a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

This golf front property offers comfort, warmth, seclution and privacy in any of its large bedrooms, commons spaces with a neat and clean open space concept, giving an ample view of the amazing surroundings enhancing each detail with a modern design and minimalistic decor.Villa Mandala is governed by a mesmerizing white in every nook, from the dining room with its enchantment to the garden, guided by wooden doors. The large gallery with the alfresco dining leads you to a palapa next to a large swimming pool where you can welcome your friends for a BBQ with other delicious dishes you can prepare on the fully equipped professional kitchen.When it's time to sleep or you want to take a quick nap, you can go upstairs on the main building and find the master bedroom with a king bed, full bathroom with shower and tub and walk-in closet, a second bedroom with another king bed, full bathroom with shower and walk-in closet and the third bedroom with 2 twin beds, full bathroom with shower and walk-in closet. Next is the guest house with all bedrooms downstairs. The forth bedroom has two full beds, full bathroom with shower and walk-in closet, finally the fifth and the sixth bedroom have king bed each, a full bathroom with shower and walk-in closet each. All bedrooms have TV except bedroom with Twin Beds.Every morning when you wake up in the main building get out to the large terrace to enjoy the marvelous views you can get of this amazing place.

listing.listing_description: Great Bluffs Estate is a fabulous luxury villa in the East End of Grand Cayman near Barefoot Beach. Nestled amid bluffs along the island's North Shore, the waterfront villa features a private beach for snorkeling and panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea. Accommodations for twelve and benefits from Silver Thatch Guest Services make it an excellent choice for families or large groups of friends seeking a stylish and private alternative to a hotel or resort. The recently renovated home projects a classic Caribbean character, with white stucco facades, a rooftop of cobalt-blue tile, and a terracotta motor court, while the luminous interiors and tastefully vibrant décor are freshly contemporary. The multi-tiered outdoor living areas feature two green-turf lawns as well as a lovely palapa and a wood gazebo. A freshwater pool invites you to a delicious plunge under the sun or moon, while the hammock welcomes afternoon siestas in the ocean breeze. Linger outdoors at sunset and at night for island cocktails in the lounge.The home's spacious interiors inhale the sea-kissed air and exquisite island light through glass doors and plentiful windows. A cavernous, two-story great room features an ample lounge area with TV. A lovely salon extends from one side of the living room, while the other wing features the fully equipped kitchen and dining areas, including a luminous bay and a formal dining table for ten.There are four suite-style bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms—two with king beds, two with queens—as well as two additional guestrooms that share a bathroom between them. The two king suites and one of the queen suites open to balconies and enjoy gorgeous ocean views. The master suite is ideal for couples, with a spacious lounge, a secluded desk area, and a cavernous bathroom with dual vanity and soaking tub perched beside a triptych of picture windows.The waters off your private beach feature plentiful marine life and gentle currents for snorkeling, and are generally unvisited by tourists. For swimming, head to nearby Barefoot Beach—one of the island's finest. There are stores and restaurants just two kilometers down the road, and two nearby resorts offer myriad opportunities for watersports, dining, and play._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Beautifully situated near Rum Point on a secluded stretch of white-sand beach along the northern coast of Grand Cayman, Fischer's Reef is a dreamy, beachfront luxury villa perfectly designed for ocean-view entertainment and relaxation. With comfortable accommodations for fourteen people, including kid-friendly bedrooms and a crib, the villa is an ideal vacation rental for destination wedding guests and families seeking exquisite privacy and style on their Cayman Islands getaway. Accommodations for sixteen and benefits from Silver Thatch Guest Services make it an excellent choice for families or large groups of friends seeking a stylish and private alternative to a hotel or resort.Surrounded by picturesque palm trees, the villa features a stunning infinite swimming pool and ocean-view terrace, from which you'll step directly onto the pristine, white-sand shore of the Caribbean Sea. Savor long days and evenings swimming in the turquoise waters, swaying in palm-strung hammocks, bathing on poolside sun loungers, and sipping cocktails in the cabana pavilion with its comfortable furnishings and lovely lanterns. Closer to the villa, in the shade of the second-floor veranda, a large, alfresco dining area invites you to delicious meals in the ocean breeze.Wide glass doors open from the terrace into the villa's luminous living-and-dining area, where the open plan creates the perfect setting for festive and relaxing evenings. The dining tables, running parallel to the alfresco tables on the patio, seat twenty for memorable feasts, while the comfortable living room includes multiple cozy sofas and a flat screen TV. In the adjoining room, the fully equipped kitchen includes a charming breakfast table beside ocean-view glass doors to the exterior.The villa features four bedrooms with king beds, three with queens, and one with two twin-size bunk beds (perfect for kids). All eight bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms, and four feature beautiful ocean views. The master bedroom includes a walk-in closet and a private, ocean-view balcony, and its ensuite bathroom has a stand-alone shower and bathtub. The bedrooms are furnished and decorated with an elegant simplicity that captures and emphasizes the island's natural beauty and incomparable light.While giving you privacy and seclusion on the island's beautiful northern shore, Fischer's reef is just a mile from Rum Point Club, with its restaurants and fun activities for visitors of all ages._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take in the beauty of Turtle Cove on Providenciales from Avalon. Laid out around a resort-worthy infinity pool, the four-bedroom villa has stunning ocean views, luxurious amenities, and comfortable living spaces that are open to the sea breezes. Come with family or friends to enjoy gracious, hotel-style accommodations in a private setting.The centerpiece of the house is a large infinity-edge swimming pool, complete with swim-up bar. It’s surrounded by a travertine pool deck, equipped with plenty of chaise longues and spots for outdoor dining. At one end is a gazebo with an outdoor kitchen with a gas grill, fridge and bar, plus speakers that connect to the home’s sound system. Inside, there’s a home theatre and DVD library, plus air conditioning to ensure your comfort.Many of Avalon’s living spaces have walls of pocket doors that can be opened to turn the rooms into outdoor areas. In keeping with the breezy atmosphere, the decor is airy and light, featuring white walls, high ceilings, and wicker furniture, with blue accent cushions bringing the color of the sea inside. The open-air dining room has views of both the ocean and Turtle Cove Marina, making for lively meals. The indoor kitchen is equally bright and open, with white cabinets, stainless steel appliances and a spacious granite-topped central island.Each of the property’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom with shower, air conditioning, a ceiling fan, and a TV. There are three bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two queen beds. The master bedroom, which has a king bed, is located in its own private tower and opens to the pool terrace on one side and a private outdoor shower for two on the other.Avalon has a very convenient location on the island of Providenciales. From the villa, it’s less than a minute on foot to the nearest beach on famed Grace Bay. By car, it’s a 3-minute drive to the closest restaurants, a 5-minute drive to the grocery store and a short trip to the international airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This sleek contemporary villa is perfect for individuals seeking serene privacy, yet walking distance to the beach. Set in a palm filled garden, the elegant lines of the house draw you to the calming view. Green tropical foliage edged with the sapphire rim of the sea creates a peaceful atmosphere. This is a space to relax with a book or glass of champagne and totally forget the world. While great for small families and groups of friends, it’s perfect for honeymoon couples. It has an intimate and romantic feel.The clean modern design of the house perfectly blends the open plan interior onto the generous outdoor spaces filled with dining and lounging spaces. Travertine tiles visually connect the spaces. Elegant, inviting designer furniture, used inside and outside, has a Euro style in soothing taupe, off white and grey with touches of vibrant color. The interior spaces have ample seating for enjoying the entertainment features of the house as well as indoor dining. A well-appointed kitchen pairs beautifully with the flow of the house. In deep aubergine, steel and grey granite, the kitchen opens to both the exterior and interior spaces connecting the chef with the guests. Covered, multilevel terraces create opportunities to change the scene. On the main level is the large fiber optic pool which delights with ever changing colors at night. Or perhaps enjoy the outdoor pool table for a bit of sport. For really spectacular views, head up to the roof top living space for a spectacular perch to watch the view from sunrise to sunset. A hot tub provides a tranquil spot for detoxing from stress.The three bedrooms, with hardwood floors, are equal size, have air condition and flat screen TVs with Apple TV plus en suite bathrooms. Each has private seating on covered terraces. One bedroom is off the main villa; two are in a separate casita. The spa bathrooms are fabulously oversized with indoor and outdoor showers opening to private garden views.Although secluded, you are close to amenities. You are steps from Plum Baie Beach. 15 minutes to the airport and in 10 minute you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case and Philipsburg’s shopping haven.

listing.listing_description: Step off the terrace of this next-level Cancún villa and find yourself instantly walking the sands of a dream beach. Located in the prime of the Zona Hotelera, guests can relax in the sumptuous interiors, take meals on the shaded dining terrace, or drink in a sunset from the upper level hot tub. Guests are just steps from a stunning white sand beach, with the city a very short taxi ride away.This charming and hospitable home is a fantastic choice for a group looking to unwind, relax and take in the glory of the Cancún beachfront. Located in a central section of Cancun’s renowned hotel zone, guests can make the most of on-street access, before experiencing the plush, polished interiors. Massive, welcoming sofas dominate the spacious living soon, while the fully-equipped kitchen comes complete with a supplied chef, who will prepare 3 delicious and freshly-made meals for your group every day. From the outdoor dining space, guests can take in the rippling water and sunlight shining on the sea beyond, while being swaddled in the pleasant shade.Cancún offers some of the most-famed attractions along the Mexican Carribbean coast, and this beautiful oceanside villa is just a short trip from fast-paced casinos, themed bars and huge variety of restaurants at this famous resort. Take a cruise out to the peaceful Isla des Mujeres to visit pristine sands and happening beach bars, or get more active and take on snorkeling or sea-ziplining. With the beach just outside the villa, guests have access to swimming, sun-bathing and sea sport rentals without compare, all drenched in the glow of a welcoming Carribbean sun. Savor a cool michelada in the shade of the outdoor dining area when your packed day is complete.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Like an ivory sculpture on the majestic cliffs overlooking Anguilla’s Little Bay, the six bedroom Ani South has been designed to offer an unforgettable Caribbean vacation. Unique to Ani South is its configuration, accessible to guests via an elevator, roll-in showers, pool lift and wheelchair access – all subtly designed within the home’s conceptualization. At Ani South, the amenities of a world class resort and the privacy of an enclave combine to offer you the ultimate carefree and sun soaked holiday!Have a splash in the heated infinity swimming pool. Or perhaps a soothing soak in the dramatic cliff-edge hot tub? Other resort-themed perks include a roof lounge, golf carts, mountain bikes, pool lift and a night-lit tennis court with cabana lounge. A gas grill sets the tone for exquisite alfresco dining. Indoors, you will find a media room, a shared exercise room, billiards table and games room. Wi-Fi access and baby equipment are also provided. Ani’s impeccable service will have you hooked. The staff includes a breakfast chef, master chef, two butlers, a cocktail specialist and a tennis instructor. Beach bags are packed with snorkel gear and the staff ‘magically’ get there before you to set up. How about a gourmet meal with a white-linen dining table right by the ocean?The sleek furnishings and contemporary finishes provide clear views of the Caribbean Sea from almost every angle at Ani South. Wake up to breathtaking sea and sky hues from your bedroom each new morning. The interiors are clean, bright and modern, with naturally hewn wooden furniture serving as accent pieces throughout. Breeze through indoors and out for a casually elegant island experience!The six stunning bedrooms at Ani South accommodate up to twelve guests. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans. All three master bedrooms (with direct outdoor access) as well as the indoor and outdoor living spaces are oriented towards the breathtaking western view down the Anguilla coastline and towards evening sunsets.The experience at Ani South is further enhanced by Anguilla’s unsurpassed collection of shockingly white sand beaches, crystal clear turquoise waters, an amazing assortment of local and fine dining restaurants alongside a warm and welcoming local population. Anguilla delivers sophisticated luxury travel while retaining its laid back island charm. The cliff-edge wedding deck also makes Ani a great venue for special events. Come experience a fresh tropical tempo!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Gaze upon endless ocean views from this stately house on the eastern tip of Saint Martin’s French side. Work on your vacation tan from one of the poolside sun loungers or settle in for a nap beneath the shaded hammock. At dinner, the alfresco set on the wrap-around terrace is a breezy setting for fresh seafood. Or, drive 10-minutes to Marigot for a wide selection of fusion restaurants.White-washed exposed-beams support Azur Reve’s extra-tall ceilings and create wide openings to the pool deck. The interior’s simple color palette contrasts Saint Martin’s lush greens and glowing blues in the most idyllic way. Light wood tones and terracotta tiles add another earthy element to remind guests of the beauties beyond. At night, gather around the wet bar for a tropical cocktail. If you’re keeping up with a fitness routine, the exercise room, situated in a separate pavilion, offers another fantastic ocean-view to enjoy while you workout.Start your day with a round of golf at Mullet Bay, an incredibly scenic course that follows the outline of the Dutch-side bay. After, meet up with the rest of the group on the sandy shores of Baie Rouge, just 4-minutes from home. If you’re in the mood for some duty-free shopping, Marigot, Grand Case, and Philipsburg are all packed with high-end fashion houses. All three cities have vibrant nightlife scenes as well, and the furthest is only 17 kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Casa Buch is a superb luxury villa located within the resort community of Puerto Los Cabos outside San José del Cabo, with access to Fundadores Beach Club. Perched on a gentle slope along the East Cape, the home features ample outdoor living and dining areas with expansive views of the ocean, mountains, and golf fairways, while its light-filled interiors blend high-end features with a rustic, bohemian elegance. Five lovely bedrooms including a private, three-bed casita offer ideal accommodations for family reunions, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to ten in size.The villa's terrace and veranda form a theater for savoring the gentle ocean breeze and panoramic views. Steep your body in the hot tub and bathe in the swimming pool while gazing upon the vast tableau of coast, sea, and sky. Kindle the barbeque in the afternoon and relish a meal in the pergola's dappled shade. Sip home-made cocktails in the evening as the sky transforms over the Sea of Cortez.The villa's casual elegance embodies the quintessential vibe of Los Cabos. The open-concept living room features multiple sitting areas and tables, its luminous white tones complementing the natural wood accents and touches of sea-inspired blue. Pocket doors create a dreamy current of air between the pool terrace, interiors, and courtyard. The adjoining kitchen features chef-grade appliances and generous prep space including an island with wet bar.The main house includes two king bedrooms and two guestrooms with pairs of double beds. The master suite boasts a cavernous bathroom and a private balcony with breathtaking views. Both of the double bedrooms open to the pool terrace, while the second king bedroom opens to the courtyard though a comfortable TV den. The casita includes a queen bed, two smaller beds, and a living area with kitchenette.Puerto Los Cabos features 2,000 acres of oceanfront property, including a marina, Fundadores Beach Club, and golf courses designed by Jack Nicklaus and Greg Norman. Your villa is also within minutes of Puerto Los Cabos Golf Course and an easy drive to Palmilla. Playa Las Palmas Beach and Costa Azul Beach are both within easy reach, while the enchanting colonial streets of San José del Cabo are just seven kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This extraordinary estate style villa enchants the moment you enter the gate. The long, palm-lined drive brings you to a large private courtyard and garden. Beyond the front door is a stunning house and one of the most dazzling oceans views on island. Panoramic vistas flow from every room and terrace. The colors are magical. An expansive stretch of sapphire sea is framed by the villa’s gardens and the rich blue sky. The large contoured pool edges overlap the lawn adding crystal blue tones to the scene.The house is open, airy and spacious; a perfect villa for an extended family, weddings or company retreat. It has everything you need to enjoy the day from dawn until dusk. The overall décor is sleek, elegant and contemporary but never boring. The large interior living room, perfect for conversation or entertainment, tastefully mixes natural elements and rich tones; dark wood and teak, wicker, cream and pops of color. Pocket doors disappear into the walls enhancing the view. Although sea views and breezes abound, the great room is fully air conditioned.The interior dining room sits adjacent to the unique kitchen area. Divided into two rooms, half the space is devoted to a gorgeous chef’s kitchen with flat screen TV. The other half is a fabulous gathering space with bar and seating. A cozy al fresco dining area sits in the courtyard just off the bar. Deep covered terraces and open sundecks surround the house, the main pool and lap pool. Comfortable lounges and dining spaces abound.The four equal size bedrooms are spacious and comfortable. Two sit on each end of the villa. The décor creates a serene atmosphere blending designer touches and art; neutral tones of beige, brown, black or grey and white with individual pops of rich color. Each room has private seating, sea views and beautiful spa style bathrooms in travertine, stone and wood. Three bathrooms have private outdoor showers; one has a sea view.Although secluded, you are close to amenities. It’s a short drive to Plum Bay Beach and five minutes to the airport. In 10 minutes you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case and Philipsburg’s shopping haven.

listing.listing_description: _ Please note that this property is next to a construction project, please contact us for more details. _Located right on the edge of Marigot Bay in St. Bart’s, Eden House is a luxury vacation rental with its own private beachfront and direct access to the ocean. With three beautiful bedrooms, Eden House has accommodations for six, perfect for a family getaway, vacation with friends, or a romantic honeymoon.Wake up to an amazing ocean view, make yourself an espresso, and then head down to the private beach. Relax in a lounge chair and watch the sun rise, and begin your day with a long dip in the ocean. At Eden House, it’s that easy. For lunch, an alfresco barbeque meal on the terrace, and then an afternoon swim in the infinity pool. For dinner, there is formal dining for eight, and after, there’s plenty of indoor and outdoor space for hosting an intimate beach house soiree.Carefully selected bright accents direct guest’s attention to each area of the open concept design. A red coffee table between two plush couches signifies the living room, while gorgeous wooden cabinetry dictates the area for the kitchen. Straight lines, muted tones, and angular architecture open the interior space, keeping it bright and filled with fresh ocean breeze. The merging of indoor and outdoor space is a key element to the flow of the villa. With large openings across the entire terrace, it’s easy and exciting to blur those lines.All of the bedrooms at Eden House feature king sized beds, ensuite bathrooms, dual vanities, Apple TV, and walk-in closets. The two bedrooms on the first floor have private terraces and ocean views, while the bedroom on the main floor features a garden view.If you feel like a trip into the city, the nearby town of Gustavia is rich with fine dining, boutique shops, and vibrant nightlife. If you’re looking for an adventure, try hiking the Colombier Beach Trail, it leads to a secluded beach, only accessible by foot and boat.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
