listing.listing_description: Casa Suhana is a spectacular villa on Mexico's Riviera Nayarit, just minutes south of downtown Puerto Vallarta and Conchas Chinas. The home is perched on a lofty hillside in the gated community of San Xaoquin, with breathtaking views of the Bay of Banderas and Pacific Ocean. Beautiful rustic accents complement superb modern furnishings and high-end amenities for relaxation and play, including an infinity swimming pool and kid-friendly game room. Five ample bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms accommodate up to fourteen travelers, ideal for families and destination wedding guests. Your vacation rental at Casa Suhana includes complimentary housekeeping, laundry, and two meals per day day.The three-story villa is ideally designed for savoring the outdoor lifestyle of this enchanting coastline. Wide doors fuse the open-concept interior with the expansive pool terrace, creating a seamless flow of space and sea-kissed air. Dip into the swimming pool and bask in the brilliant sunlight on lounge chairs facing the vast horizon. Behold the sunset from the pool-side sofa or the top-floor terrace, kindling the fire pit as night falls over the Pacific.The great room features a large Apple TV and comfy sofas beneath high, thatched ceilings, a lovely venue for festive gatherings or serene relaxation. The open kitchen is fully equipped with top-of-the-line appliances, and there is a built-in grill on the terrace beside it. The game room is perfect for playful afternoons or late-night fun, featuring foosball, a poker table, and more.The villa includes two king suites, one suite with an individual queen bed, and two suites with pairs of queen beds. Each room features air conditioning, a ceiling fan, a safe, and an ensuite bathroom, and four of the rooms have ocean views. The superb master suite includes a walk-in closet and sitting areas both inside and on its private balcony. The master bath also opens to a balcony, and its tub and shower enjoy expansive views through wall-to-wall glass.Casa Suhana is just minutes from Playa Punta Negra and Playa Palmares, and 12 kilometers from downtown Puerto Vallarta and Playa Los Muertos. The city's iconic Malecon esplanade is less than six kilometers away. Golfers are an easy drive from Marina Vallarta Golf Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: While staying in this Colonial-style villa, you’ll be treated to upscale amenities and views of the Cul de Sac lagoon and ocean. Boasting contemporary decor, this is one of our most modern St. Barts villa rentals. St. Barts has a reputation for being a go-to destination by the rich and famous thanks to its uncrowded white sandy beaches, designer boutiques and prestigious atmosphere.Enjoy a day of lounging poolside on one of the many stylish sun beds on the terrace, it faces the water and is surrounded by palm trees. If you get warm, go for a dip in the immense pool, or cool off with an alfresco shower. Once the sun sets, this area lights up and is perfect for entertaining—there’s a gas barbecue and an outdoor dining area, as well as a hot tub for soaks under the stars. Start your mornings in the fitness room, and for an extra fee, the concierge can also arrange for spa treatments and child care service. Daily housekeeping (except Sundays and holidays) and linen changes are included with your stay.Once inside, you’ll still be able to see the ocean from every room of the house. You’ll notice a nautical-themed decor in the living space of this luxury villa, as well as soaring ceilings and island-inspired furnishings. The sleek kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances including an espresso machine, wine cellar and a dishwasher.Four air-conditioned bedrooms allows for eight guests to stay here. All rooms are individually decorated and feature en-suite bathrooms with showers, queen-sized beds and televisions with DVD players. They also include private balconies with sitting areas (the fourth room is in a separate bungalow).But the highlight of this estate is that it is just a five-minute walk down hill to the lagoon of Cul de Sac and the restaurants that line the beach. You’re also only 8.1 km away from the top-notch restaurants, boutiques and galleries of Gustavia, the island’s bustling capital.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy the turquoise Turks and Caicos waters from your own seaside retreat at Villa Osprey. Located in the Silly Creek area of Providenciales, this charming three-bedroom getaway has extensive outdoor spaces and beautifully appointed living areas. With features like a hot tub and a children’s pool, the villa is ideal for romantic stays and family vacations alike.Situated on an acre of oceanfront land, Villa Osprey takes advantage of its setting with plenty of spots to swim, relax and dine. A large terrace with plenty of chaise longues surrounds the infinity pool, wading pool and hot tub, while a tiki hut-style structure provides a shady spot to grill and dine. A walkway leads to a gazebo perched on a cliff, and down at the shore, you’ll find two kayaks, a private swim deck and a boat dock. For your convenience, the villa is also equipped with baby equipment and Wi-Fi access.The villa’s soft peach walls curve around the pool in a gentle U-shape, so that nearly every room has an ocean view. The open-plan living and dining room, which opens to the pool terrace, is painted the same soothing pastel shade, and a high ceiling and dark wicker furniture create an airy, tropical vibe. Just off the dining room, the fully equipped kitchen continues the calming palette with white cabinets, cream-colored walls and long stretches of stone countertop.Each of the three bedrooms at Villa Osprey has an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, a ceiling fan, and television with DVD player. Two of the bedrooms have king beds and oceanfront terraces; one has its own sitting area as well. The third bedroom has two twin beds, which can be pushed together to form a king bed, and a garden view.It’s possible to swim from the villa’s private deck, but if you’d like to experience the islands’ famed sandy beaches, you’ll find one just 2 miles away. From the villa’s location in Silly Creek, it’s a 15-minute drive to the hospital and airport, a 20-minute drive to Grace Bay and a fitness center, and 9 miles to the Provo golf club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
